sense.def:
Z besedo
every
povemo, da govorimo o vseh članih skupine ali delih nečesa.

seg.quote: She spoke to every person at the party.
I loved every minute of it.

sense.def:
Z besedo
every
povemo tudi, da se nekaj dogaja v rednih časovnih razmikih.

seg.quote: I visit her once every six months.
Every so often, she spends a weekend in London.

sense.def:
Z besedo
every
povemo, kako pogosto se nekaj dogaja. Na primer, če se nekaj dogaja
every second day
ali
every other day
, se zgodi vsak drugi dan.

seg.quote: We only take a vacation every other year.

sense.def:
Every
uporabljamo pred številom, kadar hočemo povedati, na kolikšen delež oseb ali stvari se nekaj nanaša.

seg.quote: One woman in every two hundred is a sufferer.
Since 1976, nine women have lost jobs for every five men.

sense.def:
Če nekaj kaže
every sign of happening
ali kadar obstaja
every chance that it will happen
, je zelo verjetno, da se bo nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: They show every sign of continuing to succeed.

sense.def:
Če ima nekdo
every reason to do something
, bo upravičeno nekaj storil.

seg.quote: She had every reason to be pleased.
